snippet: More than 20,000 burglary, assault and other cases were not investigated last year by the Houston police because of a lack of personnel, according to a report released Monday.
lead_paragraph: More than 20,000 burglary, assault and other cases were not investigated last year by the Houston police because of a lack of personnel, according to a report released Monday.

headline.main: Texas: Crimes Went Uninvestigated, Report Says
headline.print_headline: Texas: Crimes Went Uninvestigated, Report Says
